alert.note: Alert for Apple and Lucerne Valleys; Coachella Valley; Riverside County Mountains; San Bernardino County Mountains; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Mountains; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued April 03 at 1:24PM PDT until April 03 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...West winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino County Mountains, Riverside County Mountains, San Diego County Mountains, Apple and Lucerne Valleys, Coachella Valley, San Diego County Deserts and San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning. The strongest winds will be along and near the desert slopes of the mountains. * WHEN...Through 11 PM PDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Strong winds could damage trees and other objects. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of blowing dust could reduce visibility at times. Sudden, gusty cross-winds could be hazardous for high-profile vehicles
info.instruction: Use caution if you must drive.
